baseline_groups.claim_summary: WTP for public recognition of gym attendance increases with the number of gym visits (YMCA experiment).
baseline_groups.notes: Linear OLS of WTP on visits using the YMCA coherent sample. The quadratic version is a functional form variant, not a separate baseline.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: WTP for public recognition of charitable giving increases with the giving interval (charity experiments).
baseline_groups.notes: Two baselines (linear and quadratic) on the pooled charity sample. Subsample specs are sample restriction robustness checks.

global_notes: Two distinct experimental contexts (YMCA and charity) testing image concerns. Three specs flagged as potentially invalid due to duplicate results. OLS only; original paper also uses Tobit.
